meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by pyorrhea.
meanings.sent1: The dentist diagnosed her with pyorrheal gums.
meanings.sent2: The pyorrheal infection caused her gums to swell.
meanings.sent3: The pyorrheal tooth fairy left pus-filled coins under her pillow.
meanings.sent4: His pyorrheal anger erupted like a volcano.
meanings.sent5: The putrid smell of her pyorrheal breath filled the room.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the discharge of pus.
meanings.sent1: The wound was pyorrheal, oozing yellow pus.
meanings.sent2: The pyorrheal sore on his arm needed immediate attention.
meanings.sent3: The pyorrheal pimple on his nose popped at the worst moment.
meanings.sent4: Her pyorrheal eyes were red and swollen from the infection.
meanings.sent5: The pyorrheal wound on his leg festered and worsened over time.
